snippet: The composer M. Lamar offers a bracing alternative to the dispiriting traffic in blandly competent art clogging the gallery system these days.
abstract: Ken Johnson reviews exhibit Negrogothic, a Manifesto, the Aesthetics of M Lamar, featuring video work of artist M Lamar, at Participant Inc gallery.
lead_paragraph: The composer M. Lamar offers a bracing alternative to the dispiriting traffic in blandly competent art clogging the gallery system these days.

headline.main: M. Lamar: ‘Negrogothic, a Manifesto, the Aesthetics of M. Lamar’
headline.print_headline: M. Lamar: ‘Negrogothic, a Manifesto, the Aesthetics of M. Lamar’
